long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: I am developing an app that enables users to clip the URLs of websites they visit using an extension, and manage and store them. Using the extension, the app sends the clipped site's information to the server, which retrieves and stores the URL's metadata. Users can view the metadata of the URLs they have saved when they log in to the web. The extension simply serves as a tool to send the URL information to the server upon the user clicking "clip," and to receive success or failure responses.
